import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Card, Table, Container, Row, Col, Button, } from "react-bootstrap"; import api from "services/api"; function TableList() { const [data, setData] = React.useState([]); const getJobs = async () => { const response = await api.get('/company/listMyEmployees'); const { data } = response.data; setData(data); } useEffect(() => { getJobs(); }, []) return ( <> Tabela de dados de Funcionários { data.map(job => { return ( { window.alert(job.id); }} > ) }) }
